# discord_color (Data Source)

A utility data source that converts a hex color string or RGB values to a Discord color integer. This is not backed by an API call. Provide either hex or rgb.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

# Convert a hex color to a Discord color integer
data "discord_color" "brand_blue" {
  hex = "#3498DB"
}

# Convert RGB values to a Discord color integer
data "discord_color" "custom_red" {
  rgb = {
    r = 231
    g = 76
    b = 60
  }
}

# Use in a role definition
resource "discord_role" "colored" {
  guild_id = "123456789012345678" # Replace with your guild ID
  name     = "Blue Team"
  color    = data.discord_color.brand_blue.int
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `hex` (String) The hex color string (e.g. "#FF0000").
- `rgb` (Attributes) The RGB color values. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rgb))

### Read-Only

- `int` (Number) The computed color as an integer.

<a id="nestedatt--rgb"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rgb`

Required:

- `b` (Number) Blue component (0-255).
- `g` (Number) Green component (0-255).
- `r` (Number) Red component (0-255).
